logger.doc:name: Start Log
logger.message: transactionID: #[vars.transactionId]], correlationID: #[vars.correlationId], message: "Before inserting into covid case master DB call", payload: #[payload]

db:insert.doc:name: Insert Covid Case Master
db:insert.db:sql: insert into sakila.cvd_case_master(source, case_type, first_name, last_name, phone, email, date_of_birth, national_id, national_id_type, street_address, city, state, postal, country, create_date, update_date, create_by, update_by) values(:source, :case_type, :first_name, :last_name, :phone, :email, :date_of_birth, :national_id, :national_id_type, :street_address, :city, :state, :postal, :country, :create_date, :update_date, :create_by, :update_by)

logger.doc:name: End log
logger.message: [transactionID: #[vars.transactionId]], correlationID: #[vars.correlationId], message: "After inserting into covid case master DB call", payload: #[payload]]

logger.doc:name: Start Log
logger.message: transactionID: #[vars.transactionId]], correlationID: #[vars.correlationId], message: "Before updating covid case master DB call", payload: #[payload]

db:update.doc:name: Update covid case master
db:update.db:sql: update sakila.cvd_case_master set source=:source, case_type=:case_type, first_name=:first_name, last_name=:last_name, phone=:phone, email=:email, date_of_birth=:date_of_birth, national_id=:national_id, national_id_type=:national_id_type, street_address=:street_address, city=:city, state=:state, postal=:postal, country=:country, create_date=:create_date, update_date=:update_date, create_by=:create_by, update_by=:update_by where case_id=:case_id

logger.doc:name: End Log
logger.message: [transactionID: #[vars.transactionId]], correlationID: #[vars.correlationId], message: "After updating covid case master DB call", payload: #[payload]]

logger.doc:name: Start Log
logger.message: transactionID: #[vars.transactionId]], correlationID: #[vars.correlationId], message: "Before fetching covid case by nationalID DB call", payload: #[payload]

db:select.doc:name: Select covid case by nationalID
db:select.db:sql: select case_id, source, case_type, first_name, last_name, phone, email, date_of_birth, national_id, national_id_type, street_address, city, state, postal, country, create_date, update_date, create_by, update_by from sakila.cvd_case_master where national_id = :national_id

logger.doc:name: End Log
logger.message: [transactionID: #[vars.transactionId]], correlationID: #[vars.correlationId], message: "After retrieving covid case by nationalID DB call", payload: #[payload]]
